histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.AfterClick.Mainframe.CookieWaitTime
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time that the navigation to a previously prefetched page was delayed because cookies had to be copied from the isolated cookie jar.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.AfterClick.Subresources.UsedCache
histogram.summary: Records whether a previously prefetched subresource from an Isolated Prerender was served from cache when its page was later navigated to.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.BodyLength
histogram.summary: Records the response body length as cached in memory encountered when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for non-network error prefetches only.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.ConnectTime
histogram.summary: Records the time taken to establish a socket connection when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for non-network error prefetches only.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.CookiesToCopy
histogram.summary: Records the number of cookies that needed to be copied from the prefetch navigation to the user's profile after a prefetched link is navigated to.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.NetError
histogram.summary: Records the Net Error encountered when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for every completed prefetch.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.RespCode
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code encountered isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for non-network error prefetches only. Redirects are not included here.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.RetryAfter
histogram.summary: Records the duration of a Retry-After header on a 503 response to a mainframe prefetch request.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.TotalRedirects
histogram.summary: Records the total number of redirects encountered while doing all the prefetches on an eligible Google Search Result page. Only recorded when at least one prefetch was attempted.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Mainframe.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Records the total time taken when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for successful non-network error prefetches only.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Subresources.NetError
histogram.summary: Records the net error encountered when prefetching a single subresource during Isolated Prerenders.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Subresources.Quantity
histogram.summary: Records the number of subresources that were NoStatePrefetch'd during an Isolated Prerender. Recorded once for each page that is NoStatePrefetch'd during Isolated Prerenders.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Prefetch.Subresources.RespCode
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code encountered when prefetching a single subresource during Isolated Prerenders.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Proxy.Fallback.NetError
histogram.summary: Records the Net Error encountered when Chrome did a fallback from the prefetch proxy. Recorded only on fallbacks.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.Proxy.RespCode
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code encountered when connecting to the prefetch proxy CONNECT tunnel. Recorded every time Chrome gets CONNECT tunnel response headers.

histogram.name: IsolatedPrerender.SpareRenderer.CountStartedOnSRP
histogram.summary: Records the number of spare renderers that were attempted to be started on the SRP, when the feature param is enabled.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.AfterClick.Mainframe.CookieWaitTime
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time that the navigation to a previously prefetched page was delayed because cookies had to be copied from the isolated cookie jar.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.AfterClick.Subresources.UsedCache
histogram.summary: Records whether a previously prefetched subresource from an Isolated Prerender was served from cache when its page was later navigated to.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.BodyLength
histogram.summary: Records the response body length as cached in memory encountered when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for non-network error prefetches only.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.ConnectTime
histogram.summary: Records the time taken to establish a socket connection when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for non-network error prefetches only.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.CookiesToCopy
histogram.summary: Records the number of cookies that needed to be copied from the prefetch navigation to the user's profile after a prefetched link is navigated to.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.NetError
histogram.summary: Records the Net Error encountered when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for every completed prefetch.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.RespCode
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code encountered isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for non-network error prefetches only. Redirects are not included here.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.RetryAfter
histogram.summary: Records the duration of a Retry-After header on a 503 response to a mainframe prefetch request.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.TotalRedirects
histogram.summary: Records the total number of redirects encountered while doing all the prefetches on an eligible Google Search Result page. Only recorded when at least one prefetch was attempted.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Mainframe.TotalTime
histogram.summary: Records the total time taken when isolated prefetching a mainframe HTML resource from the Google Search Result Page. Recorded for successful non-network error prefetches only.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Subresources.NetError
histogram.summary: Records the net error encountered when prefetching a single subresource during Isolated Prerenders.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Subresources.Quantity
histogram.summary: Records the number of subresources that were NoStatePrefetch'd during an Isolated Prerender. Recorded once for each page that is NoStatePrefetch'd during Isolated Prerenders.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Prefetch.Subresources.RespCode
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code encountered when prefetching a single subresource during Isolated Prerenders.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Proxy.Fallback.NetError
histogram.summary: Records the Net Error encountered when Chrome did a fallback from the prefetch proxy. Recorded only on fallbacks.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.Proxy.RespCode
histogram.summary: Records the HTTP response code encountered when connecting to the prefetch proxy CONNECT tunnel. Recorded every time Chrome gets CONNECT tunnel response headers.

histogram.name: PrefetchProxy.SpareRenderer.CountStartedOnSRP
histogram.summary: Records the number of spare renderers that were attempted to be started on the SRP, when the feature param is enabled.
